thread.title: A Dude Tried To Troll This Supermarket's Twitter Account And Things Got Weird Fast - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: A Dude Tried To Troll This Supermarket's Twitter Account And Things Got Weird Fast - BuzzFeed News

author: Kassy Cho
title: A Dude Tried To Troll This Supermarket's Twitter Account And Things Got Weird Fast - BuzzFeed News
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @PeeWeeMFC75 ID: 10288957 2. “Cam” from Morrisons responded right away with a single word of sage advice. View this image ›
Twitter: @Morrisons ID: 10288972 3. Some serious bants followed. View this image ›
Twitter: @Morrisons ID: 10288986 4. Things got pretty intimate. View this image ›
Twitter: @Morrisons ID: 10288959 5. The epic exchange went viral after it was noticed by another Twitter user, who dubbed it “the golden age of customer service.” View this image ›
Twitter: @NaturallyTiss ID: 10288960 6. People, obviously, praised Cam for being an absolutely star throughout the whole thing. View this image ›
Twitter: @NikkiLuigi ID: 10289121 7. “The truth is I nicked the photo off my friend,” the Twitter user PeeWeeMFC75 told BuzzFeed News. “I thought I’d have a bubble and it’s all gone a bit silly.” View this image ›
Twitter: @JimboUpNorth ID: 10289126 8. “Cam is the star really but we made a good double act,” they said. View this image ›
Twitter: @josephajross ID: 10289134 9. BuzzFeed News has reached out to Morrisons to find out more about who this legendary Cam is. View this image ›
Twitter: @idkcharl ID: 10289145
